basics.name: Paul Devianne
basics.summary: I am a 24yo Master student in Computational Science and Engineering at EPFL, Switzerland. Currently, I am doing a 6-month research thesis at NUS, Singapore, working on Equivariant Neural Networks for Ion transport simulation.
